p.d: Sarah continues her search for the truth. Who is Ines? How long had she and Alex been lovers? As Sarah questions her husband's family, she discovers other passionate letters sent by Ines. Letters that contain clues that might finally enable her to identify the young woman. Her name is Ines Paoli. And it turns out that she died in fire that was started deliberately, twenty years ago, along with all her family. The mystery deepens... Directed by: Christophe Lamotte (France, 2018) Screenplay: Clothilde Jamin, Clélia Constantine Cast: Claire Keim (Sarah), Marie Bunel (Hélene Aguze), Samuel Jouy (Yann Kasik), Yann Trégouët (Matthieu Aguze), Anne Caillon (Nadine), Bastien Bouillon (Louis Aguze), Géraldine Martineau (Justine), Camille Aguilar (Lili Aguze), Gaspard Pasquet (Paul Aguze), Cyril Garnier (Alex Aguze), Lucienne Deschamps (Léonie), Loqman Menas (Jamel), Hocine Choutri (Xavier Dugeais) Genre: drama
